title: Blood Ties S1 Disc 4
description:
DVD-Rip of Disc 4 of the Blood Ties Season 1 collection. Inlcudes all menus, ready to burn to DVD. This torrent contains the following episodes:

16. Bugged
17. The Devil You Know
18. Drawn And Quartered
19. Wrapped
20. The Good, The Bad, And The Ugly

All eps are uncut, high dvd-quality, with full titles and end credits.

Please support this wonderful show by purchasing the episodes from ITunes or the DVD set from Amazon UK (Region 2 only!). And let&#039;s keep pushing for another season of Blood Ties!

For your information, if you saw this show on Lifetime TV in the USA, the original season of 22 epsiodes was split up into 2 "seasons", this set will include all 22 episodes which make up the full Season 1. I will upload the other discs as soon as there are more seeds on this torrent besides just me. So please, SEED SEED SEED! And enjoy!
